statement.tex: \\ %text Given that \[ I = \frac{1}{3}\int\frac{dz}{z} \], will the integral evaluate to the following (in terms of x)? %

reason.tex:
%text We have simply applied the \underline\text{standard result} \[ \qquad \int\frac{dz}{z} = \log\vert z\vert + C \].
And therefore
\[ I = \frac{1}{3}\int\frac{dz}{z} = \frac{1}{3}\log\vert z\vert + C = \frac{1}{3}\log\vert\underbrace{ 1+x^3}_{z = 1+x^3}\vert + C \] %
